meanings.definition: A person who derides or ridicules others.
meanings.sent1: The deriders in the schoolyard made fun of the new student.
meanings.sent2: The teacher talked to the deriders about being kind to their classmates.
meanings.sent3: The deriders' jokes were not funny to anyone but themselves.
meanings.sent4: The deriders' words were like sharp arrows, piercing the hearts of their targets.
meanings.sent5: The image of the deriders laughing at others stayed in my mind for days.
